title: Skin Deep
description: *Warning - This book contains instances of self harm in the form of an eating disorder and may be a trigger to some readers.*She hates me.I’m in love with her.Her life is a masquerade.Mine is cloaked in secrets.She thinks I can’t see her.But she’s the only thing I can see.She thinks we have nothing in common.We have everything in common. And I’m done being patient.I'm determined.She's stubborn.You think you know us.You don't.The things you know about us are only Skin Deep.** This book is a STANDALONE novel featuring characters that were introduced in Stolen Breaths. It is a spin-off. Not a sequel.**
author: Pamela Sparkman
